page.title: 10Employment
page.content: In our school we carried out a survey to find out about the jobs that parents of the children at school do. We found out that over half the fathers work in the village and surrounding areas while the others commute to London each day. Fathers that work in the village and surrounding area have jobs such as farmers,railway workers, British telecom workers and local policemen. The fathers that work in London have a variety of jobs such as taxi drivers, bank workers, printers, tailors, solicitors, civil engineers and security guards.Most of the children's mothers who worked, did so in the village and surrounding area. They had jobs including school dinner ladies, shop assistants, secretaries,cleaners, teachers, and jewellers. There are only four fathers who are unemployed.
